snippet.title: PROJECT XSTING | OFFICIAL RELEASE DATE TRAILER 🍉
snippet.description:
Project XSTING places players in the shoes of a daring escapee who just broke out from a top-secret laboratory and is now facing the highly trained WASP army of soldiers and formidable bosses. Armed with character mutations and smart upgrade choices, players must fight their way to freedom in this fast-paced and adrenaline-pumped sci-fi adventure with rougelite elements. Project XSTING is launching January 5, 2024 for PC on Steam and Epic Games.

🎮 Steam: https://bit.ly/3R4hB9B
🎮 Epic: https://bit.ly/46MTDW5
💬 Discord: https://bit.ly/3NVyF0H
🍉 Website: https://bit.ly/413fXtu

#ProjectXSTING #games #indiegame #gaming #gameplay #indie #indiegames #steam #survivor #bullethell #bulletheaven #pcgaming #SaucyMelon
